attributes.action: Reduce fuel duty and VAT on petrol and diesel - currently 52.95p per litre
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living is becoming obscene and people who primarily use their cars for work are unable to fund the petrol in their vehicles. Fuel is upwards of 180p per litre at the moment and that is extortionate.
attributes.background: The government need to do something about the obscene price of fuel - either sanction the companies or reduce the duty and VAT percentage.

rejection.details:
We understand you want fuel duty and VAT on fuel to be reduced, however it's not clear by how much you want these to be reduced, or to what amount. 

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions: 

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
